homepage.seo_title: BrewCraft Coffee | Artisanal Coffee Shop & Workspace | Portland
homepage.meta_description: Discover locally roasted coffee, craft beverages & comfortable workspace at BrewCraft. Perfect for coffee lovers & remote workers in Portland.

hero.headline: Where Craft Coffee Meets Productive Space
hero.subheadline: Your neighborhood destination for artisanal coffee and remote work
hero.hero_copy: Serving locally roasted beans and handcrafted beverages in a comfortable workspace environment

value_propositions: Locally sourced, freshly roasted coffee beans

features.title: Craft Coffee Bar
features.description: Full range of espresso drinks, pour-overs, and cold brew
features.benefit: Experience exceptional coffee prepared your way

features.title: Remote Work Haven
features.description: Dedicated workspace areas with all amenities
features.benefit: Stay productive in a coffee-friendly environment

faq.question: Do you offer workspace reservations?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer daily and monthly workspace packages with dedicated seating and power outlets

faq.question: Can I purchase your coffee beans to brew at home?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We sell our full selection of locally roasted beans by the bag

tone_of_voice.writing_style: Warm, knowledgeable, and welcoming with a focus on craft and quality

seo_recommendations.content_strategy: Focus on craft coffee expertise and workspace benefits
